member.name: M:QuickSort.QuickSort`1.sampleSize(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Return an odd sample size proportional to the log of a large interval size.

member.name: M:QuickSort.QuickSort`1.pivot(`0[])
member.summary: Estimate the median value of entries[Left:Right]
member.remarks: A sample median is used as an estimate the true median.

member.summary: Swap two entities of type T.
